attributes.name: fieldNames
attributes.description: If more than one field is selected, the arrays have to be 1-dimensional.

attributes.name: columnLabels
attributes.description: Define column labels or use predefined columns. Predefined values are ABC, ZYX, 123 and you can select those by using the spread operator ['...ABC']. You can also merge the two like this: ['custom field', 'custom field2', '...ABC']

attributes.name: rowLabels
attributes.description: Define row labels or use predefined rows. Predefined values are ABC, ZYX, 123and you can select those by using the spread operator ['...ABC']. You can also merge the two like this: ['custom field', 'custom field2', '...ABC']

attributes.name: printDirection
attributes.description: Which direction should rows be printed. Horizontal means printing rows top-down, vertical means left-right.

attributes.name: rowsPerPage
attributes.description: How many rows per page should be pre-selected in the pagination when datagrid loads.

attributes.name: hidePaginationIfLessThan
attributes.description: Hide the pagination if rows are less than x values.
